Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, excellent value, excellent hotel”

Reviews.Content: private hotel edwardian building clean sizeable competitive price central location plenty bars restaurants nearby double comfortable double beds 2 comfy chairs reasonable desk space windows air con looking onto frontage free wifi breakfast cooked relatively quiet road pleasant location friendly staff cant youd eat choose 5 minutes walk safe inroom ironboard limited electrical sockets creaky floorboards probably prefer standardised predictability chains suspect tight 35 cheaper breakfast chain ok quirky property personally ill returning
